trans-unit.source: (Default)
(dynamic view)
. [elro]
3.0.3 - unreleased
6.0.0 (unreleased)
Add Python 2 / 3 compatibility [davilima6]
Add cmf.ModifyViewTemplate zcml permission for “Modify view template” [toutpt]
trans-unit.target: Add cmf.ModifyViewTemplate zcml permission for “Modify view template” [toutpt]

trans-unit.source: Add i18n translation domain to the zcml to remove UserWarning.
Added conditional import for typeClasses to make the code CMF1.6 compatible while staying CMF1.5 backwards compatible. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 为typeClasses添加了条件导入,使代码兼容CMF1.6,同时保持CMF1.5向后兼容。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Adding a Dynamic View FTI through ZMI is back. This closes https://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6976 [glenfant]
trans-unit.target: Adding a Dynamic View FTI through ZMI is back. This closes https://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6976 [glenfant]

trans-unit.source: Adjusted deprecation warnings to point to Plone 4.0 instead of Plone 3.5 since we changed the version numbering again. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 由于我们又改变了版本号,所以调整了弃用警告,指向Plone 4.0而不是Plone 3.5。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Avoid deprecation warning in Zope 2.13. [davisagli]
Breaking changes:
Bug fixes:
CMFDynamicViewFTI is a product for dynamic views in CMF.
CMFDynamicViewFTI is a product for dynamic views in CMF. The product contains an additional base class for types and a new factory type information (FTI).
trans-unit.target: CMFDynamicViewFTI是CMF中动态视图的产品。该产品包含一个额外的类型基类和一个新的工厂类型信息(FTI)。

trans-unit.source: Change getViewMethod’s ‘enforce_available’ argument to default to False instead of True. If someone goes to the trouble of either using python or adding a property to indicate a specific template as the default layout, we should let them. [rafrombrc]
trans-unit.target: Change getViewMethod’s ‘enforce_available’ argument to default to False instead of True. If someone goes to the trouble of either using python or adding a property to indicate a specific template as the default layout, we should let them. [rafrombrc]

trans-unit.source: Changelog
Cleanup: PEP8 et al., security/zca via decorators, … [jensens]
trans-unit.target: Cleanup: PEP8 et al., security/zca via decorators, … [jensens]

trans-unit.source: Contributors please read the document Process for Plone core’s development
trans-unit.target: 贡献者请阅读文档Plone核心开发过程

trans-unit.source: Converted dummy test sample types to be extension profile based. This profile is only registered during test runs. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 将哑巴测试样本类型转换为基于扩展配置文件。这个配置文件只在测试运行期间注册。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Copied addWithPresettings.pt from GenericSetup 1.3 branch r79408. This fixes a startup error in buildouts caused by the move to an egg. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: 从GenericSetup 1.3分支r79408复制了addWithPresettings.pt。这修复了在构建过程中由于移动到蛋中而导致的启动错误。[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Declared package dependencies and fixed deprecation warnings for use of Globals. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 声明了包的依赖关系,并修正了使用Globals的废弃警告。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Don’t instantiate browser view to check for existence. [malthe]
trans-unit.target: Don’t instantiate browser view to check for existence. [malthe]

trans-unit.source: Don’t use
Fatal crash: Fatal Python error: Cannot recover from stack overflow
trans-unit.target: 致命的崩溃。致命的Python错误。无法从堆栈溢出中恢复

trans-unit.source: Fix https://github.com/plone/Products.CMFPlone/issues/591 [gotcha]
Fix BrowserDefaultMixin.__call__ (never normally used in vanilla Plone) to work with views. [elro]
trans-unit.target: 修复BrowserDefaultMixin.__call__(通常在vanilla Plone中从未使用过),使其与视图一起工作。[elro]

trans-unit.source: Fix adapter lookup on Python 3. [ale-rt]
Fix missing ClassType in Python 3
Fix some deprecation warnings. [gforcada] (#18)
Fix tests to pass if Five/Zope3 is installed. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 修复安装Five/Zope3时通过的测试。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Fixed a bug in getViewMethod. A present, but empty ‘layout’ attribute now also returns the default view instead of ‘’. Returning the empty string sends PortalContent.__call__() into a loop. [stefan]
trans-unit.target: Fixed a bug in getViewMethod. A present, but empty ‘layout’ attribute now also returns the default view instead of ‘’. Returning the empty string sends PortalContent.__call__() into a loop. [stefan]

trans-unit.source: Fixed dependency on zope.app.container for the IAdding interface. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 修正了 IAdding 接口对 zope.app.container 的依赖。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Fixed fallback to default view. [gbastien] (#16)
Fixed test setup to work with ZCA-based GenericSetup profile registry. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: 修正了测试设置,以便与基于ZCA的GenericSetup配置文件注册表一起工作。[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Fixes plone/Products.CMFPlone#2874

Implemented fallback to default view: If a selected view (i.e. template) does not exist, return the default view instead of - ultimately - NotFound. You can enable this option by setting the FTI’s new ‘default_view_fallback’ property to True. [stefan]
trans-unit.target: Implemented fallback to default view: If a selected view (i.e. template) does not exist, return the default view instead of - ultimately - NotFound. You can enable this option by setting the FTI’s new ‘default_view_fallback’ property to True. [stefan]

trans-unit.source: Import from zope.browsermenu. [hannosch]
Improved Plone 2.1 integration: getDefaultPage. Replace try/except with a better checking for Plone. Bonus: whitespaces cleanup. [deo]
trans-unit.target: Intégration Plone 2.1 améliorée:getDefaultPage.Remplacez try/except par une meilleure vérification de Plone.Bonus:nettoyage des espaces blancs.[deo]

trans-unit.source: Initial release.
Made ‘safe_callable’ truly safe by using ‘safe_hasattr’.
Made tests compatible with CMF 2.2. [hannosch]
Made tests use CMFTestCase. There is no Plone dependency whatsoever.
trans-unit.target: 制作测试使用CMFTestCase。没有任何Plone依赖性。

trans-unit.source: Making use of Zope 3 interfaces with proper reverse bridges. [optilude]
trans-unit.target: 利用Zope 3接口与适当的反向桥接。[optilude]

trans-unit.source: Merged z3-views-integration branch. [svincic]
Minor packaging updates. (#1)
New features:
No changes.
No changes. [hannosch]
Overview
Ported tests to plone.app.testing [tomgross]
Provide BrowserDefaultMixin.__browser_default__ so subclasses do not have to provide their own. [elro]
trans-unit.target: 提供BrowserDefaultMixin.__browser_default__,这样子类就不必提供自己的。[elro]

trans-unit.source: Purged old Zope 2 Interface interfaces for Zope 2.12 compatibility. [elro]
trans-unit.target: 为兼容Zope 2.12,清理了旧的Zope 2接口。[ELRO]

trans-unit.source: Removed BBB code for CMF prior to 1.6 and fixed import errors in tests. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 删除了1.6之前CMF的BBB代码,并修正了测试中的导入错误。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Removed BBB interface.py module [tomgross]
Removed CMFDefault dependency [tomgross]
Removed bogus test setup. All the stuff is done by the layer anyway. [stefan]
trans-unit.target: 删除了假的测试设置。反正所有的东西都是由层完成的。[stefan]

trans-unit.source: Removed docstrings from some methods to avoid publishing them. From Products.PloneHotfix20160419. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 删除了一些方法中的docstrings以避免发布它们。来自Products.PloneHotfix20160419。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: Removed five:registerPackage. [hannosch]
Removed migrate module, which didn’t work in CMF 2.1 anymore. Use GenericSetup profiles for handling portal types instead. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6899. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Removed migrate module, which didn’t work in CMF 2.1 anymore. Use GenericSetup profiles for handling portal types instead. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6899. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Removed some BBB code. [hannosch]
Removed tests/runalltests.py and tests/framework.py. To run tests use Zope’s testrunner: ./bin/zopectl test –nowarn -s Products.CMFDynamicViewFTI [stefan]
trans-unit.target: Removed tests/runalltests.py and tests/framework.py. To run tests use Zope’s testrunner: ./bin/zopectl test –nowarn -s Products.CMFDynamicViewFTI [stefan]

trans-unit.source: Removed the view alias of index.html, as this would block uploading of files called index.html into folders. You can enable this in your own types if you want. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 删除了index.html的视图别名,因为这会阻止上传名为index.html的文件到文件夹中。如果你想的话,可以在你自己的类型中启用这个功能。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Rename menus - turns out dotted names don’t really work with the ZCML magic that’s creating interfaces on the fly (it’s akin to having a variable name with a dot in it) [optilude]
trans-unit.target: Rename menus - turns out dotted names don’t really work with the ZCML magic that’s creating interfaces on the fly (it’s akin to having a variable name with a dot in it) [optilude]

trans-unit.source: Revert the BrowserDefaultMixin.__browser_default__ change, it is unnecessary. Instead set the
trans-unit.target: 将BrowserDefaultMixin.__browser_default__的更改改回,这是不必要的。取而代之的是设置

trans-unit.source: Slightly adjusted the tests to new CTC version. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 根据新的CTC版本对测试进行了轻微的调整。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Source Code
Sources are at the Plone code repository hosted at Github.
trans-unit.target: Sources are at the Plone code repository hosted at Github.

trans-unit.source: Standardized the interface location to an interfaces module. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 将接口位置标准化为接口模块。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Stop Acquisition for default_page. [panjunyong]
Test using plone.app.contenttypes instead of Archetypes. [davisagli]
The BrowserDefaultMixin class adds some methods to classes. It is not required to make use of the basic features but it is recommend to subclass your types from the class to gain more functionality.
trans-unit.target: BrowserDefaultMixin类为类增加了一些方法。它不需要使用基本功能,但建议从该类中子类化你的类型以获得更多的功能。

trans-unit.source: The FTI contains two new properties for the default view method and supplementary view methods. The queryMethodID functionality used for alias lookups is enhanced to support a new keyword (dynamic view).
trans-unit.target: FTI包含两个新属性,分别用于默认视图方法和补充视图方法。用于别名查找的queryMethodID功能得到了增强,以支持一个新的关键字(动态视图)。

trans-unit.source: There are two event subscribers registered:
Updated package metadata. [hannosch]
Updated some import locations. We require a minimum of Zope 2.10 now. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Mise à jour de certains lieux d'importation.Nous exigeons maintenant un minimum de Zope 2.10.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Use new displayviews menu to find view titles; rework Z3 view test to use a test zcml file. [mj]
trans-unit.target: Utilisez le nouveau menu Displayviews pour trouver les titres des vues;retravaillez le test de vue Z3 pour utiliser un fichier zcml de test.[mj]

trans-unit.source: Use ulines for view_methods in py3. Fix test for py3. [pbauer] (#15)
trans-unit.target: 在 py3 中为 view_methods 使用 ulines。修正py3的测试。[pbauer](#15)

trans-unit.source: When a default object is used as layout for a container, if the default object is deleted or moved with cut and paste, reset the default_page property of the container. [gotcha]
trans-unit.target: 当使用默认对象作为容器的布局时,如果删除默认对象或用剪切和粘贴移动默认对象,则重置容器的default_page属性。[疑难杂症]

trans-unit.source: When a default object is used as layout for a container, if the default object is renamed (iow id is changed), fix the default_page property of the container. [gotcha]
trans-unit.target: 当使用默认对象作为容器的布局时,如果默认对象被重命名(iow id被改变),固定容器的default_page属性。[疑难杂症]

trans-unit.source: Which crashes the interpreter. [jensens] (#20)
macros anymore. [hannosch]
manage_page_
pep8ify [tomgross]
rename default page if target was renamed
trans-unit.target: 如果目标被重命名,则重命名默认页面

trans-unit.source: unset default page if target no longer exists
trans-unit.target: 如果目标不再存在,则取消设置默认页面

zope.container.interfaces.IContainerModifiedEvent
zope.lifecycleevent.interfaces.IObjectMovedEvent
